part_0: Hi my name is michael the octopus!
[AD] press A to rotate left and D to rotate right.
[LEFT_CLICK] Left click your mouse to grapple.
[SPACE] You can also press the space bar to release the grapple.
Watch out for spikes, they will kill you!
Try going fast to break the glass.
Move over ink packs to refill your precious ink.
Bump or grapple buttons to open doors.
Welcome to the Black Hole Lab!
